fixes.name: Order Date Name
fixes.dax_expression: FORMAT('Orders (Sample - Superstore)'[Order Date], "MMMM") & " " & FORMAT('Orders (Sample - Superstore)'[Order Date], "yyyy")
fixes.solution_explanation: DATENAME('month',[Order Date]) -> FORMAT([Order Date], "MMMM") and DATENAME('year',[Order Date]) -> FORMAT([Order Date], "yyyy"). Concatenate using & with a space. This is a row-level date transformation, so it is implemented as a calculated column.
